title: Smith Optics Audible Sunglasses
description: Whether you're walking uptown to meetings, cruising the beach, or hiking into Evolution Basin, the Smith Polarized ChromaPop Audible Sunglasses protect your peepers while keeping your high-flying fashion mojo soaring. You'll hear gasps of admiration as the lightweight titanium frames wink suggestively in the sun, and even when things get a little heated, the silicon nose pads keep these shades firmly in place. ChromaPop lenses eliminate color confusion and enhance visual clarity. You'll be able to see broken curbs, waves breaking, and the glint of Sapphire Lake without having to squint, providing you've put in your contacts or have 20/20 vision. The hydroleophobic coating helps the lenses repel moisture, grease, and grime for the times you find yourself under the hood while wearing sunglasses. Aviator frames flatter every face shape, and the Audible sings a sweet come-and-get-it melody to medium-sized melons. Proposition 65 Warning for California Consumers: This product contains chemicals known to the State of California to cause cancer and/or birth defects or other reproductive harm.
